author: PlayStation
description:
Take on the role of Towa— sworn protector of the Shinju village— and venture into distant lands to defeat the evil god Magatsu. #TowaGame
 
Watch the first gameplay overview of Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree, and pre-order now.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree - Towa Talk Gameplay Overview | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/raidou-remastered-the-mystery-of-the-soulless-army/

This must-play classic from ATLUS launches June 19 and returns with revamped visuals, QOL updates, new VO, and an overhauled battle system.

Navigate the historic streets of a fantastical 1930s era in Tokyo or delve into the haunting Dark Realm where demons lie in wait. With over 120 demons to summon, choose your allies wisely to prevent humanity from being consumed by darkness.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Raidou Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Get ready to put the pedal to the metal — Heading Out is coming to PlayStation®5!
Experience the thrill of the open road, the weight of your choices, and the constant pressure of being on the run in this stylish, narrative-driven driving game.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Heading Out - Console Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011882/

In an age of myth and magic, ambitious wizards from around the world have assembled to undertake the perilous Trials of Legend in the Floating Lands. Many will try. Most will fail. Only those who have truly mastered the chaotic, shifting elemental forces of Arcana will become a Wizard of Legend!

Prepare to face an all-new series of unpredictably perilous trials in #wizardoflegend2—the action-packed follow-up to the acclaimed dungeon-delving original, featuring vibrant new 3D visuals and fast-paced 4-player co-op. Wield familiar and new Arcana, experiment with devious new spell combinations, and seek immortality as you return again and again (and again) to master ever-changing rogue-lite challenges.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Wizard of Legend 2 - Available Now! | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/zombie-army-vr/

Zombie Army VR is OUT NOW on PlayStation VR2!

Zombie Hitler has been defeated, but the zombie hordes are still at large, and Europe remains in the throes of war. Following the story of Zombie Army, you return to the field as one of the Deadhunters, an elite squad fighting to end the apocalypse!

Fight your way through undead hordes near the bombed-out city of Nuremberg to help Captain Hermann Wolff, the Deadhunter’s legendary leader, find his scattered family, and fight to free Europe from the zombie apocalypse.

As you navigate the full-length, story-driven campaign alone or with an ally, you will have access to an arsenal of authentic World War II weaponry including sniper rifles, submachine guns, pistols, and more. 

VR also brings a new level of immersion to the nail-biting action of the Zombie Army series, and you will need to get to grips with using your hands to aim your rifle, dual-wield your side arm with a submachine gun, a
title: Zombie Army VR - Launch Trailer | PS VR2 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Playable demo out today!

Get an early look at the game, and start exploring the original story of the manga and anime, and new game-original quests!
(Save data from the demo can be imported to carry over progress in the full game.)

―――

Take off to the stars, and adventure!
EDENS ZERO: Coming to PlayStation®5, 7/15/2025!

In this action RPG, players tap into a character’s innate power and wield it through Ether Gear while they relive key moments from the original story. Shiki is living in the dream kingdom of Granbell, surrounded by machines when he meets the first visitors to the planet in 100 years, streamer Rebecca and her blue cat, Happy.
This new group of friends now sets out on adventure to find the planet sized “Mother”.

Pre-orders available now!

PS5®：
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10012148

© Hiro Mashima / Kodansha, NTV　©Konami Digital Entertainment

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Edens Zero - Demo Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games
